vlive.korean: 확실히 무대가 큰 무대라서... It was a big stage... 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
이제 말을 하면서 좀... - 무대나 뭐 퍼포먼스 이런 거 아닐까요? We'll explain... - We can perform on the stage? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: We'll explain... - We can perform on the stage?

vlive.korean: [울 앙글이 독무로 무대를 그냥 찢었지효] 어떤데요? [But JIHYO performed so well on the stage] What do you think? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 2”
vlive.english: [But JIHYO performed so well on the stage] What do you think?

vlive.korean: 마지막 무대가 가장 시청률이 높죠 - 정말 그 표정을... People tend to watch the last one the most. - Facial expression... 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: People tend to watch the last one the most. - Facial expression...

vlive.korean: [파이널 1R 도전 무대를 끝낸 기분?] 무대를 지금 끝냈는데 어때요 소감이? [How do you feel about 1R?] You're finished with your song. How do you feel? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
vlive.english: [How do you feel about 1R?] You're finished with your song. How do you feel?

examples.korean: He came on stage amid clapping and cheering. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 박수와 환호 속에 그가 무대로 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He came on stage amid clapping and cheering. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was applauded as she came on stage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 무대에 등장하면서 박수를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was applauded as she came on stage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The stage was lit by bright spotlights. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 무대에는 환한 스포트라이트가 비춰지고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The stage was lit by bright spotlights. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The pillar obstructed our view of the stage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 기둥 때문에 우리는 무대가 잘 안 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The pillar obstructed our view of the stage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was booed and hissed off the stage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 쉭쉭거리는 야유 소리를 듣고 무대를 내려갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was booed and hissed off the stage. Add to Wordbook
